QUES:21
my problem is a^3+b^3+c^3.

LOAD R1,[1H]
LOAD R2,[2H]
LOAD R3,[3H]
MUL R4,R1,R1
MUL R4,R4,R1
MUL R5,R2,R2
MUL R5,R5,R2
MUL R6,R3,R3
MUL R6,R6,R3
ADD R7,R4,R5
ADD R7,R7,R6
STORE R7,[4H]
